bour.camus.gameofgooses.ui

Class ConsoleUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • bour.camus.gameofgooses.ui.ConsoleUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameWatcher

    public class ConsoleUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGameWatcher
    Class representing an "interface" using the console to display information.
    Author:
    Armand BOUR

        Description copied from interface: IGameWatcher
        Method called when two players swap their gooses.
        Specified by:
        onPlayerSwap in interface IGameWatcher
        Parameters:
        playerArriving - The player arriving on the cell.
        cellFrom - The cell where the new player (playerArriving) is coming from.
        playerOccupying - The player occupying the cell, and about to leave.
        cellTo - The cell where the new player is arriving, already occupied by playerOccupying.
